title: Ticket #5595: default value of PROCD_ADDRESS differs from that in documentation
description:
The documented value of PROCD_ADDRESS default differs from that in the packaged condor_config on Debian 8 and RHEL7: 

  PROCD_ADDRESS = $(RUN)/procd_pipe

I do not know which value is "right" although presumably the actual value in condor_config works.
remarks:
2016-Apr-01 11:09:13 by gthain:
Turns out this depends on the release -- the tarball generic config file puts it in $(LOCK), but the rpm and the dep put it into $(RUN), which is usually /var/run/condor. I'll update the documentation.
